memberdef.name: snd_pcm_route_open

briefdescription.para: Creates a new Route & Volume PCM.

parameterdescription.para: When set, the slave PCM handle is closed with copy PCM
on success otherwise a negative error code

simplesect.para: Using of this function might be dangerous in the sense of compatibility reasons. The prototype might be freely changed in future.

parameterdescription.para: on success otherwise a negative error code

briefdescription.para: Creates a new Route & Volume PCM.

parameterdescription.para: Configuration node with Route & Volume PCM description
on success otherwise a negative error code

simplesect.para: Using of this function might be dangerous in the sense of compatibility reasons. The prototype might be freely changed in future.
